name: Deathnik
description:
Reconstruction of the classic online game „Boxhead“ as Ego-Shooter.

You play alone or with friends against the Ork armies. Unlock new weapons and items over time. You can play on several stages and the armies get bigger and stronger with each time. So watch your back.

Although we are not finished with this project, and most likely we will not continue development, we can show you some content.

Note: You should play with controller :D
